validationRules.name: Treatment must start after diagnosis
validationRules.description: Ensures Date of Treatment is after Date of Diagnosis
validationRules.instruction: Check treatment onset is chronologically after diagnosis

validationRules.name: ECOG status must be 0-4
validationRules.description: Performance Status must be valid ECOG grade (0-4)

validationRules.name: Cancer diagnosis required
validationRules.description: Cancer Diagnosis must be populated before treatment
validationRules.instruction: Enter ICD-10 diagnosis code before documenting treatment

validationRules.name: Death date after diagnosis
validationRules.description: If deceased, Date of Death must be after Date of Diagnosis
validationRules.instruction: Check death and diagnosis dates are in proper order

validationRules.name: Deceased consistency check
validationRules.description: If Survival Status=Deceased, Date of Death must be populated
validationRules.instruction: Enter Date of Death for all patients marked as deceased

validationRules.name: Treatment response after completion
validationRules.description: Treatment Response should be assessed after treatment completion
validationRules.instruction: Only assess treatment response after treatment is complete
